name: @saibotsivad/braidedjs
description: Enterprise-ready, cost effective, highly flexible API using AWS and Cloudflare.

scripts.predeploy: npm run build && node -r esm build-wrangler-toml.js
scripts.deploy:api-rest: source secrets.sh && cd service/api-rest && wrangler publish
scripts.deploy:api-ws: source secrets.sh && cd service/api-ws && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy:aws-dynamodb: source secrets.sh && cd service/aws-dynamodb && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy:stream-ws: source secrets.sh && cd service/stream-ws && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy:www-redirect: source secrets.sh && cd service/www-redirect && wrangler publish
scripts.deploy:www-root: source secrets.sh && cd service/www-root && wrangler publish

author: saibotsivad
